name: Save The Present
description:
You have to collect presents but be careful there are bombs and ninjas who can DAMAGE you. 

Player can move only UNDERGROUND!!!There  you may see green marker it is gift position and red marker it is last enemy position.

There are some random events which can give u effects like more or less oxygen or they can slower you or make faster. Also bombs stop you for 2 seconds and you can't move! 

Controll:
  • Left Mouse Button Down - Go to lower level;
  • Left Mouse Pressed - Choosing position;
  • Left Mouse Up - Go to upper level;
